member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Instantiates the desired game logic class specified in the web.config file.
member.returns: The newly instantiated game logic as an IGameLogic object.

member.name: T:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController
member.summary: Handles all calls related to creating, selecting, editing, and deleting user accounts.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.DeleteUser
member.summary: Deactivates the current user's account.
member.returns: A message indicating that the account was successfully deactivated, or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.GetPersonalDetails
member.summary: Gets the user's personal information.
member.returns: The Users personal details in 'UserDetailsViewModel' type object.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.ChangePassword(TurnBasedGameAPI.Models.ChangePasswordBindingModel)
member.summary: Changes the password for the currently logged in user.
member.returns: An empty response with a 200 status code if the call was successful, or an error message otherwise.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves the list of active users.
member.returns: Returns a 200 status code with a list of users (providing only IDs and user names) if the call is successful, or an error message otherwise.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.GetActive
member.summary: Returns a list of the usernames for all ACTIVE users
member.returns: List of all active users

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.UpdatePersonalDetails(GameEF.AspNetUser)
member.summary: Updates user's publicly available information.
member.returns: A message indicating that the details were updated successfully, or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.AccountController.GetByUserID(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve's the publicly visible information for a single user.
member.param: The ID for the user whose details should be returned.
member.returns: A single User object (with only the publicly visible fields populated).

member.name: T:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GameLogicResponseCodes
member.summary: Expected response codes from IGameLogic calls.

member.name: F:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GameLogicResponseCodes.Invalid
member.summary: The change submitted to the game logic was not valid.

member.name: F:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GameLogicResponseCodes.Valid
member.summary: The change submitted to the game logic was valid but there is no resulting game status change.

member.name: F:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GameLogicResponseCodes.GameActive
member.summary: The change submitted to the game logic was valid and the game status should change to Active.

member.name: F:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GameLogicResponseCodes.GameInactive
member.summary: The change submitted to the game logic was valid and the game status should change to Inctive.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.#ctor
member.summary: No-arg constructor for the game controller - also instantiates the game logic specified in the web.config file.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.CreateGame(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Starts a new game instance with the caller and listed users as players.
member.param: A list of usernames specifying who should be a player.
member.returns: Returns the newly created game's ID if the game was created successfully, or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GetMyGames(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of games the user is or was a player in.
member.param: The ID of the status to filter by. (If no ID is provided, all records are returned.)
member.returns: A list of Game objects.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GetGameHistory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all game records related to a specific game.
member.param: The ID of the game whose history should be returned.
member.returns: A list of GameState objects.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.GetGame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the latest game state for the game whose ID was provided.
member.param: The ID of the game whose latest state should be returned.
member.returns: The latest GameState object for the specified game. If no game states exist, the response will be empty.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.Update(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a player's turn with the game logic implementing IGameLogic.
member.param: The ID of the game to update.
member.returns: JSON that represents the latest gamestate, assuming the game changed after a player's turn.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.Controllers.GameController.UpdateUserStatus(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the current user's status for the specified game.
member.param: The status the user would like to change to.
The ID of the game for which the user would liek to change their status.
member.returns: A success status code with an empty body, or an error otherwise.

member.name: P:TurnBasedGameAPI.Models.ChangePasswordBindingModel.OldPassword
member.summary: The user's original password.

member.name: P:TurnBasedGameAPI.Models.ChangePasswordBindingModel.NewPassword
member.summary: The user's new password.

member.name: P:TurnBasedGameAPI.Models.ChangePasswordBindingModel.ConfirmPassword
member.summary: Confirmation field for the new password.

member.name: T:TurnBasedGameAPI.NoLogic
member.summary: A sample implementation of IGameLogic that does nothing.

member.name: M:TurnBasedGameAPI.ViewModels.UserDetailsViewModel.#ctor(GameEF.AspNetUser)
member.summary: A User View Model of the AspNetUser. Returns an object with the public and private fields of the user of interest, but without the protected fields like password hash.
member.param: AspNetUser in which the public fields will be used to return a user view model

member.name: M:GameEF.UserViewModel.#ctor(GameEF.AspNetUser)
member.summary: A User View Model of the AspNetUser. Returns an object with the public fields of the user of interest.
member.param: AspNetUser in which the public fields will be used to return a user view model
